eng: to understand
I, you, we, they understand.
Do you, they, we understand?
I don't understand.
You, we, they don't understand.
We don't understand you.
Do you understand me?
Yes, I understand you.
Do you understand it's not here? — Yes, I do. ● No, I don't.
tr: Вы понимаете, (что) это* не здесь? — Да...(понимаю). ● Нет ...(не понимаю)

eng: I know they understand me.
I want to understand you.
But it's too late.
I understand it.
Do you understand it?
I don't understand it.
I know you don't understand it.
tr: Я знаю, вы этого не понимаете.

eng: But we want to understand it.
Do you want? — Yes, I do.
They don't understand me. — No, they don't.
tr: Они меня не понимают. — Нет...(они не понимают)

eng: I am sure they understand you. — Yes, they do.
tr: Я уверен, они вас понимают. — Да...(они понимают)

eng: They do not know me. — No, they don't.
tr: Они меня не знают. — Нет ...(они не знают)

eng: They know you. — Yes, they do.
She is here. — Yes, she is.
I don't understand what it is.
Do you understand?
It's not too late.
I know that you want to understand me. — Yes, I do.
tr: Я знаю, ЧТО ты хочешь меня понять. — Да... (хочу).

eng: You understand. — Yes, I do.
I don't understand what you want. — No, you don't.
tr: Я не понимаю, чего ты хочешь. — Нет ... (ты не понимаешь)

eng: Is it interesting? We don't understand it.
tr: Это интересно? Мы не понимаем это.

eng: They understand me. — No, they don't.
Do they understand me? — I'm sure they don't.
tr: Они меня понимают? — Я' уверен, (что) нет...

eng: Are you sure you understand me? — Yes, I am.
tr: Ты уверен, (что) понимаешь меня? — Да... (я уверен)

eng: I understand that it's interesting for you. — Yes, it is.
tr: Я понимаю, ЧТО вам это интересно. — Да, ...
